Introduction

Rhea was a five-member girl group formed by I.O Entertainment. The group debuted on October 1, 2021, with “Time Travel”.

Due to two members’ health issues, the group delayed their initial debut from August to September 2021. But on September 27, the scheduled release date of their debut single “Time Travel”, nothing came out. The company later revealed that the group would debut on October 1.

They are presumed to have disbanded due to a lack of social media activity since late 2021.
